choices.name: Mail_letters_or_parcel_related
choices.choiceText: Letters, e-Parcel, Parcel, Courier, Transport and/or Logistics (domestic or international) related

choices.name: PostConnect
choices.choiceText: PostConnect Data, PostConnect Production, Post Logistics International (PLI) (fixed term)

Flow.description: Create Contract Questionnaire Flow. Introduced with ECLM Project Phase 1. Includes Record Update. Defaulting Variables. Added Clone Protection. GovContract changed to Checkbox. Help Text Added. New Decision added for Apttus Trained User. New Display Text for Apttus
Flow.label: ECLMCreateContract

fields.name: AlreadyTrained
fields.fieldText: This button is used for the creation of Ariba Contract. You have been identified as Apttus trained, please use the Apttus contract record to initiate contract creation.

fields.name: ChangesHeading
fields.fieldText: Select any custom contract requirements:

fields.name: GovOrTenderResponseBool
fields.fieldText: Request to use government contract or response to tender
fields.helpText: Select if requesting to use a Government Contract or responding to a tender where Australia Post Terms and Conditions are not applicable.

fields.name: CustomProdService
fields.fieldText: Customised or enhanced product and/or service specification
fields.helpText: Select if customer wants to make a change to a standard product offer or service specification such as transit cover for every ten parcels.

fields.name: CustomPaymentTerms
fields.fieldText: Amended/customised payment terms to current policy
fields.helpText: Select if customer wants to change payment terms such as changing the payment period from 21 to 45 days.

fields.name: CustomPricing
fields.fieldText: Customised/customer specific pricing
fields.helpText: Select if the customer is requesting special pricing, discounts, rebates. Always select 'Customised Pricing' for Print Post contracts - as well as any other relevant custom requirements.

fields.name: EnterpriseSolution
fields.fieldText: Enterprise (multiple product/service offering) solution
fields.helpText: Select if you require an Australia Post enterprise wide solution including an entire business solution for another large corporation.

fields.name: DangerousGoods
fields.fieldText: Dangerous, Prohibited or Fragile Goods (excluding Wine)
fields.helpText: Select if the customer requests Australia Post to carry dangerous, prohibited or fragile goods. Wine does not fall under these categories.

fields.name: CustomLodgeCollectSort
fields.fieldText: Customised lodgement / collection / sorting
fields.helpText: Select if the Customer requests a particular lodgement, collection or sorting break that is specifically for that customer i.e. customer may only want parcels picked up from their factory location, lodged at the CBD Post facility, and sorted according to suburbs beginning with 'P'.

fields.name: ChangedTermsAndConditions
fields.fieldText: Change to Australia Post Terms and Conditions
fields.helpText: Select if the customer requests to change a term or condition in the Services Agreement or Product Schedule.

fields.name: CustomerTermsAndConditions
fields.fieldText: Request to use Customer Terms and Conditions
fields.helpText: Select if the customer requests to use their terms and conditions - please note this will be subject to Legal approval.

fields.name: NSWarning1
fields.fieldText:
Warning - selecting any of these items will result in a Non-Standard contract.

If you have a PrintPost contract you must select 'Customised/customer specific pricing'.

fields.name: Expected_Contract_Start_Date
fields.fieldText: Estimated Contract Start Date

fields.name: EstimatedContractRevenue
fields.fieldText: Total Estimated Contract Revenue

fields.name: EstimatedRevenueCategory
fields.fieldText: Estimated Revenue Category
fields.helpText:
Refer to Revenue Category Selection Guide.
.
Do not select 'small'' for Print Post - standard Print Post customers (i.e. on card rate) follow "as is" process.
.
If you want to request changes to the contract, you need to select Medium, Large or Enterprise. Please note that any request to change a small revenue contract will be assessed using the non-standard process.

fields.name: ContractGuide
fields.fieldText: Click here for the Revenue Category Selection Guide to estimate whether contract revenue is small, medium, large or enterprise.

fields.name: ContactNotRequiredText
fields.fieldText: A contract is not required. Please click Finish to return to your Opportunity.

fields.name: ContractTermType
fields.fieldText: Contract Term Type
fields.helpText:
Fixed Term Select if you require a medium, large or enterprise contract to be fixed term - please note that this will make the contract non-standard.
Perpetual Perpetual/Open Ended is the standard contract period for most contracts - select if you wish a medium, large or enterprise contract to be standard.

fields.name: NSWarning2
fields.fieldText: Warning - selecting a Fixed contract term type will result in a Non-Standard contract.

fields.name: ErrorText
fields.fieldText: There was an error writing the questionnaire results to your Opportunity record. This is most likely because of validation rules. The error is - {!$Flow.FaultMessage}. Please note that the contract has not been generated. You will need to correct the Opportunity first, and then click on 'Create Contract' button again to generate your contract.

fields.name: NonStdContractSummary
fields.fieldText: You will be creating a {!OpportunityType} Contract which is {!ContractType}. Please note that a request for a Non-Standard Contract is not automatically accepted. If your request for a Non-Standard Contract is rejected then you will need to create a different Opportunity and repeat the 'Create Contract' process. Please click Finish to return to your Opportunity.

fields.name: Infotext
fields.fieldText:
You are required to complete this questionnaire to generate a contract for your customer.
Your answers to this questionnaire will be used to generate a standard or non-standard contract and workflow.

fields.name: OpportunityType
fields.fieldText: Is the opportunity -
fields.helpText:
Letters, e-Parcel, Parcel, Courier, Transport and/or Logistics (domestic or international) related Select if you want to create a contract for Parcel, eParcel, International Letter or Parcel, Messenger Post Courier or Unaddressed Mail.
Financial, Identity and Commercial Services Select if you want to create a contract for Agency Services, Bank@Post, Identity Services or any other financial services product.
PostConnect Data, PostConnect Production, Post Logistics International (PLI) (fixed term) Select to create a contract for PostConnect Data, PostConnect Production or Post Logistics International (PLI).
None of the above Select for a non-contracted product.

fields.name: AlreadyComplete
fields.fieldText: You have already generated a Contract for this Opportunity.

fields.name: ContractSummary
fields.fieldText: You will be creating a {!OpportunityType} Contract which is {!ContractType}. Please click Finish to return to your Opportunity.
